title: Kite
description:
A kite. Usually diamond-shaped with a tail, this emoji appears in various colors across platforms.

Unlike other vendors, Huawei's design is shaped like a bird of prey.
apple_vendor_description: The kite emoji on Apple devices soars with vibrant colors and a graceful, aerodynamic design, featuring a classic diamond shape and a trailing tail. Rendered with Apple's signature soft gradients and realistic lighting, it appears to catch the wind, conveying a sense of freedom, playfulness, and joy. This emoji evokes carefree moments and outdoor fun, perfectly capturing the spirit of a breezy day on Apple devices.
